    • Constructor Detail

      • BoxWebHookSignatureVerifier

        public BoxWebHookSignatureVerifier(String primarySignatureKey,
                                   String secondarySignatureKey)
        Creates a new instance of verifier specified with given primary and secondary keys. Primary key and secondary key are needed for rotating purposes, at least at one has to be valid.
        Parameters:
        primarySignatureKey - primary signature key for web-hooks (can not be null)
        secondarySignatureKey - secondary signature key for web-hooks (can be null)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - primary key can not be null

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        public boolean verify(String signatureVersion,
                      String signatureAlgorithm,
                      String primarySignature,
                      String secondarySignature,
                      String webHookPayload,
                      String deliveryTimestamp)
        Verifies given web-hook information.
        Parameters:
        signatureVersion - signature version received from web-hook
        signatureAlgorithm - signature algorithm received from web-hook
        primarySignature - primary signature received from web-hook
        secondarySignature - secondary signature received from web-hook
        webHookPayload - payload of web-hook
        deliveryTimestamp - devilery timestamp received from web-hook
        Returns:
        true, if given payload is successfully verified against primary and secondary signatures, false otherwise

      • sign

        public String sign(BoxWebHookSignatureVerifier.BoxSignatureAlgorithm algorithm,
                   String key,
                   String webHookPayload,
                   String deliveryTimestamp)
        Calculates signature for a provided information.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - for which algorithm
        key - used by signing
        webHookPayload - for singing
        deliveryTimestamp - for signing
        Returns:
        calculated signature
